entry.title: Creating my own page with Jekyll and Github
entry.content:
Why?

I want to share my thoughts with the community.

I have been working as a Developer for a long time now without my own page. So i decided to create one on Github and with a short discussion thx to Marco Pivetta . I copied his page and quickly dived into the code and found it very simple to setup.

Within just a few hours i was able to setup and modify my page. So here i am finally. Keep watching for updates.
